actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to impose an excise tax on insurance companies not meeting certain coverage and rating standards with respect to health insurance provided to small companies.
short_title: Small Employer Health Benefit Reform Act of 1990

summary.text: Small Employer Health Benefit Reform Act of 1990 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to impose an excise tax on insurance companies which do not meet requirements concerning coverage, rating, or disclosure and recordkeeping with respect to accident and health insurance provided to small employers.

titles.title: Small Employer Health Benefit Reform Act of 1990

A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to impose an excise tax on insurance companies not meeting certain coverage and rating standards with respect to health insurance provided to small companies.
